Million.time_to_count: About 12 days if you count one number every second, without stopping.

Billion.time_to_count: About 32 years if you count one number every second, without stopping.

Trillion.time_to_count: About 32 thousand years if you count one number every second, without stopping.

Quadrillion.time_to_count: About 32 million years if you count one number every second, without stopping.

Quintillion.time_to_count: About 32 billion years if you count one number every second, longer than the age of the universe.

Sextillion.time_to_count: About 32 trillion years if you count one number every second, much, much longer than the age of the universe.

Septillion.time_to_count: So long that it is far beyond any real time in our universe.

Octillion.time_to_count: So long that it is far beyond any real time in our universe.

Nonillion.time_to_count: So long that it is far beyond any real time in our universe.

Decillion.time_to_count: So long that it is far beyond any real time in our universe.

Undecillion.time_to_count: Unimaginably long, much longer than the age of the universe.

Duodecillion.time_to_count: Unimaginably long, much longer than the age of the universe.

Tredecillion.time_to_count: Unimaginably long, much longer than the age of the universe.

Quattuordecillion.time_to_count: Unimaginably long, far beyond any real time in the universe.

Quindecillion.time_to_count: Unimaginably long, far beyond any real time in the universe.

Sexdecillion.time_to_count: Unimaginably long, far beyond any real time in the universe.

Septendecillion.time_to_count: Unimaginably long, far beyond any real time in the universe.

Octodecillion.time_to_count: Unimaginably long, far beyond any real time in the universe.

Novemdecillion.time_to_count: Unimaginably long, far beyond any real time in the universe.

Vigintillion.time_to_count: Unimaginably long, far beyond any real time in the universe.

Centillion.time_to_count: So huge that even trying to count that high is beyond anything we can really imagine.

Googol.time_to_count: Impossible in practice. The universe would be gone long before you finished counting one number every second.

Googolplex.example: 1 followed by a Googol of zeros
Googolplex.time_to_count: Beyond impossible. The universe is too small to even write this number down, let alone count to it.

Infinity.time_to_count: Never ends. You could count forever and still never be done.

definitions.Plus (+ or Add): Putting two piles of numbers together to make a bigger pile.
definitions.Minus (- or Subtract): Taking some numbers away from the pile.
definitions.Times (x or Multiply): Adding the same number over and over again really fast.
definitions.Divide (÷): Sharing a number into equal groups.
